creator: info@orangexl.com
text:
The security section currently does not provide any links to external sources 
for more security related material. This should be the case (altough anyone can 
Google).

Some ideas:
http://www.sans.org/ or http://www.sans.org/top20/ or both
http://www.cert.org/
http://www.w3.org/Security/
http://cve.mitre.org/
http://www.apacheweek.com/security/

I don't really think we should be in the business of providing this kind of
general security info.  But thanks for your suggestion.
creator: slive@apache.org
